name: Human-pose-estimation
body:
# dataset description  
***
our dataset(K2) is composed about 10K depth images captured by kinect2. We transformed the depth value of the image to 0~255.K2 contains many different posees with different distances in many different scenes, including many challenging scenes and some unusual posed and occluded-poses.It contains about XX train images and XX test images.  

***
